tool.name: Screen
tool.description: a compound against a library using RDKit
tool.command: python3 '$__tool_directory__/screen.py' --smiles_mol '$comparator.input' -i '$infile' -if sdf #if $comparator.comparator_opts == 'mol' --isMol #end if #if $fragment_opts -f '$fragment_opts' #end if --simmin '$sim_min' --simmax '$sim_max' -d '$descriptor_opts' -m '$metric_opts' #if $hac_min != '' --hacmin '$hac_min' #end if #if $hac_max != '' --hacmax '$hac_max' #end if #if $mw_min != '' --mwmin '$mw_min' #end if #if $mw_max != '' --mwmax '$mw_max' #end if $thin -o '$outfile' -l '$logfile'

param.name: comparator_opts
param.label: Input type
param.help: Enter SMILES string or Mol file.

param.name: infile
param.label: Input file
param.help: Input file in SDF or JSON format, for comparison

param.name: fragment_opts
param.label: Find single fragment
param.help: Find single fragment if more than one (hac = biggest by heavy atom count, mw = biggest by mol weight )

param.name: hac_min
param.label: Minimum heavy atom count
param.help: Minimum number of heavy atoms for a candidate to pass screening

param.name: hac_max
param.label: Maximum heavy atom count
param.help: Maximum number of heavy atoms for a candidate to pass screening

param.name: mw_min
param.label: Minimum molecular weight
param.help: Minimum molecular weight for a candidate to pass screening

param.name: mw_max
param.label: Maximum molecular weight
param.help: Maximum molecular weight for a candidate to pass screening

param.name: thin
param.label: Thin mode
param.help: Write only properties to the SD-file (?)

tool.help:
.. class:: infomark
**What this tool does**
Screen a library against a compound, filtering by fingerprint similarity and a number of other properties.
.. class:: infomark
**Input**
| - Compound library in `SDF Format`_ | - Compound to screen against in `SMILES`_ or `SDF Format`_ | - Type of fingerprint | - Required molecular weight and heavy atom count
.. _SDF Format: http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Chemical_table_file .. _SMILES: http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Simplified_molecular_input_line_entry_specification
-----
.. class:: infomark
**Output**
SD-file of screened compounds, with new 'Similarity' property.
